languages.text: "Ну что, падаль?" {n}Маражай оглядывается вокруг, кривя губы.{/n} "Каково вам быть цепными псами архонта, впавшего в немилость самого Векта? Сколько вас всех держат здесь, вместе с вашим разваливающимся надзирателем? Все еще верите, что, когда надобность в вас отпадет, вас не скормят Сай'лантреш — вероятно, вместе с Назракеем заодно?"

"Well, meat?" {n}Marazhai looks around, his lips curving.{/n} "How does it feel to be the attack dogs of an Archon who has fallen out of favour with Vect himself? How long have you all been kept here, huddled together with your crumbling overseer? Do you still believe they will not feed you to Sai'lanthresh when you are no longer needed, most likely alongside Nazrakhei?"
languages.original_text: "Ну что, падаль?" {n}Маражай оглядывается вокруг, кривя губы.{/n} "Каково вам быть цепными псами архонта, впавшего в немилость самого Векта? Do you still believe they will not feed you to Sai'lanthresh when you are no longer needed, most likely alongside Nazrakhei?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Nun, Fleisch?" {n}Marazhai blickt sich um, seine Lippen kräuseln sich.{/n} "Was ist das für ein Gefühl, der Kampfhund eines Archonten zu sein, der selbst Vects Gunst verloren hat? Wie lange wurdet Ihr hier festgehalten, mit Eurem bröckelnden Aufseher zusammengepfercht? Glaubt Ihr immer noch, dass man Euch nicht an Sai'lanthresh verfüttern wird, wenn Ihr nicht mehr gebraucht werdet? Vermutlich an der Seite von Nazrakhei?"
languages.original_text: "Well, meat?" {n}Marazhai looks around, his lips curving.{/n} "How does it feel to be the attack dogs of an Archon who has fallen out of favour with Vect himself? How long have you all been kept here, huddled together with your crumbling overseer? Do you still believe they will not feed you to Sai'lanthresh when you are no longer needed, most likely alongside Nazrakhei?"

traits.locale_text: "Nun, Fleisch?" {n}Marazhai blickt sich um, seine Lippen kräuseln sich.{/n} "Was ist das für ein Gefühl, der Kampfhund eines Archonten zu sein, der selbst Vects Gunst verloren hat? Wie lange wurdet Ihr hier festgehalten, mit Eurem bröckelnden Aufseher zusammengepfercht? Glaubt Ihr immer noch, dass man Euch nicht an Sai'lanthresh verfüttern wird, wenn Ihr nicht mehr gebraucht werdet? Vermutlich an der Seite von Nazrakhei?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “怎么了，死人？”{n}玛拉斋环顾四周，嘴角上翘。{/n}“这个执政官已经失去了维克特的青睐，给他当狗的感觉如何？你们和这些行将就木的家伙已经在真实世界呆了多久了？当他不再需要你们的时候，你们真的以为，他不会把你们喂给赛·兰斯雷什吗？”
languages.original_text: "Well, meat?" {n}Marazhai looks around, his lips curving.{/n} "How does it feel to be the attack dogs of an Archon who has fallen out of favour with Vect himself? How long have you all been kept here, huddled together with your crumbling overseer? Do you still believe they will not feed you to Sai'lanthresh when you are no longer needed, most likely alongside Nazrakhei?"

traits.locale_text: “怎么了，死人？”{n}玛拉斋环顾四周，嘴角上翘。{/n}“这个执政官已经失去了维克特的青睐，给他当狗的感觉如何？你们和这些行将就木的家伙已经在真实世界呆了多久了？当他不再需要你们的时候，你们真的以为，他不会把你们喂给赛·兰斯雷什吗？”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Eh bien, tas de viande ? » {n}Marazhai regarde autour de lui, un sourire carnassier aux lèvres.{/n} « Appréciez-vous d'être la chair à canon d'un archonte tombé en disgrâce auprès du grand Vect ? Depuis combien de temps êtes-vous claquemurés ici sous le commandement de cette relique ? Vous savez qu'ils vous jetteront en pâture à Sai'lanthresh dès que vous aurez perdu votre utilité, n'est-ce pas ? Et Nazrakhei n'y échappera pas non plus. »
languages.original_text: "Well, meat?" {n}Marazhai looks around, his lips curving.{/n} "How does it feel to be the attack dogs of an Archon who has fallen out of favour with Vect himself? How long have you all been kept here, huddled together with your crumbling overseer? Do you still believe they will not feed you to Sai'lanthresh when you are no longer needed, most likely alongside Nazrakhei?"

traits.locale_text: « Eh bien, tas de viande ? » {n}Marazhai regarde autour de lui, un sourire carnassier aux lèvres.{/n} « Appréciez-vous d’être la chair à canon d’un archonte tombé en disgrâce auprès du grand Vect ? Depuis combien de temps êtes-vous claquemurés ici sous le commandement de cette relique ? Vous savez qu'ils vous jetteront en pâture à Sai'lanthresh dès que vous aurez perdu votre utilité, n'est-ce pas ? Et Nazrakhei n'y échappera pas non plus. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «¿Y bien, carne?» {n}Marazhai mira a su alrededor, curvando lentamente sus labios.{/n} «¿Qué se siente al ser los perros de ataque de un Arconte que ha perdido el favor de Vect? ¿Cuánto tiempo lleváis aquí, acurrucados con vuestro supervisor fracasado? ¿Seguís pensando que no os harán servir de alimento a Sai'lanthresh en cuanto dejéis de ser necesarios, probablemente en compañía de Nazrakhei?».
languages.original_text: "Well, meat?" {n}Marazhai looks around, his lips curving.{/n} "How does it feel to be the attack dogs of an Archon who has fallen out of favour with Vect himself? How long have you all been kept here, huddled together with your crumbling overseer? Do you still believe they will not feed you to Sai'lanthresh when you are no longer needed, most likely alongside Nazrakhei?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Y bien, carne?» {n}Marazhai mira a su alrededor, curvando lentamente sus labios.{/n} «¿Qué se siente al ser los perros de ataque de un Arconte que ha perdido el favor de Vect? ¿Cuánto tiempo lleváis aquí, acurrucados con vuestro supervisor fracasado? ¿Seguís pensando que no os harán servir de alimento a Sai'lanthresh en cuanto dejéis de ser necesarios, probablemente en compañía de Nazrakhei?».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「ああ、肉か？」{n}マラズハイは唇を歪めながら周りを見渡す。{/n}「ヴェクト自身の寵愛を失ったアーコンの攻撃犬になるのはどんな気分だ？お前たち全員、ボロボロになった監視者とともに身を寄せ合って、どれだけの間ここにいるんだ？必要が無くなったとき、おそらくナズラクヘイと一緒に、奴らがお前たちをセランスレッシュの餌にしないとまだ信じているというのか？」
languages.original_text: "Well, meat?" {n}Marazhai looks around, his lips curving.{/n} "How does it feel to be the attack dogs of an Archon who has fallen out of favour with Vect himself? How long have you all been kept here, huddled together with your crumbling overseer? Do you still believe they will not feed you to Sai'lanthresh when you are no longer needed, most likely alongside Nazrakhei?"

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、肉か？」{n}マラズハイは唇を歪めながら周りを見渡す。{/n}「ヴェクト自身の寵愛を失ったアーコンの攻撃犬になるのはどんな気分だ？お前たち全員、ボロボロになった監視者とともに身を寄せ合って、どれだけの間ここにいるんだ？必要が無くなったとき、おそらくナズラクヘイと一緒に、奴らがお前たちをセランスレッシュの餌にしないとまだ信じているというのか？」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Ee et parçaları?.." {n}Dudakları kıvrılmış Marazhai, etrafına bakıyor.{/n} "Bizzat Vect'in gözünden düşmüş bir Arkon'un köpeği olmak nasıl bir duygu? Harap olmuş gözetmeniniz ne zamandan beridir hepinizi burada tutuyor? Sizinle işi bittiğinde Sai'lanthresh'e kurban edilmeyeceğinize hâlâ inanıyor musunuz? Gerçi muhtemelen Nazrakhei de size katılacak."
languages.original_text: "Well, meat?" {n}Marazhai looks around, his lips curving.{/n} "How does it feel to be the attack dogs of an Archon who has fallen out of favour with Vect himself? How long have you all been kept here, huddled together with your crumbling overseer? Do you still believe they will not feed you to Sai'lanthresh when you are no longer needed, most likely alongside Nazrakhei?"

traits.locale_text: "Ee av hayvanları?" {n}Dudakları kıvrılmış Marazhai etrafına bakıyor.{/n} "Bizzat Vect'in gözünden düşmüş bir Arkon'un köpekleri olmak nasıl bir duygu? Yavaş yavaş ufalanan gözetmeniniz tarafından bir arada ne kadardır tutuluyorsunuz? Sizinle işi bittiğinde Sai'lanthresh'e kurban edilmeyeceğinize hâlâ inanıyor musunuz? Muhtemelen Nazrakhei'le birlikte?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
